text:
The Apache2 service does not restart after the httpd.conf file is modified.

Add to httpd.conf
# For PHP 5 
LoadModule php5_module "C:/PHP/php5apache2.dll"
AddType application/x-httpd-php .php

# configure the path to php.ini
PHPIniDir "C:/PHP/"

The Apache2 service does not restart with the error message:
The Apache2.2 service terminated with service-specific error 1.
creator: dvohra09@yahoo.com

text:
Apache2 service does not get restarted after making a modification, any 
modification, not just adding the PHP module, to httpd.conf.

thanks,
Deepak

(In reply to comment #0)
> The Apache2 service does not restart after the httpd.conf file is modified.
> Add to httpd.conf
> # For PHP 5 
> LoadModule php5_module "C:/PHP/php5apache2.dll"
> AddType application/x-httpd-php .php
> # configure the path to php.ini
> PHPIniDir "C:/PHP/"
> The Apache2 service does not restart with the error message:
> The Apache2.2 service terminated with service-specific error 1.
creator: dvohra09@yahoo.com

text:
There is not enough information in this problem report to help you.  It is also
unlikely that this is a bug.  Please try getting help on a user-support forum.
creator: slive@apache.org
